attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Simplify the tax system by increasing the Tax allowances to £7,800  with effect from 6 April 2009 (tax year 2009/2010).
This would allow the less well off and low income families, to earn a minimum of £150 per week, before tax and NI contributions are deducted.
This increase would benefit all and should have no detrimental effect on the amount of tax collected by the Inland Revenue each year, as those earning above this amount would still be taxed at 20%.
